permitHolder: JTG BILINGUAL CHILD DEVELOPMENT SERVICES INC

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service teaching staff acting as assistant teachers do not meet age and educational requirements
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
All teachers have not received training in infectious disease control and reporting
Child care service Assistant Teacher staff have failed to take required 15 hours of training every 24 months
Required food protection procedures were not implemented at time of inspection Holder of food protection certificate was not on site during hours of food preparation activity
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to designate/identify a qualified Education Director
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that plumbing was not installed by a licensed plumber plumbing cross connection or other hazard observed that may result in the contamination of the potable water supply Lead content of water has not been tested
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hand wash sinks are not supplied with an adequate amount of running water At time of inspection water temperature exceeded 115 deg Fahrenheit
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Required food protection procedures were not implemented at time of inspection Holder of food protection certificate was not on site during hours of food preparation activity
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hand wash sinks are not supplied with an adequate amount of running water At time of inspection water temperature exceeded 115 deg Fahrenheit

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service unable to document that all children enrolled have had an age appropriate medical evaluation

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection records of enrolled childrens periodic medical examination were not provided or maintained
Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
